projects.title: E-commerce Project
projects.summary: This project is my graduation project from NTI Frontend Training. My responsibility in this project was handling all JavaScript code and integrating the application with Firebase services.
technologies: HTML: For structuring the web pages.
JavaScript: For interactive features and logic.
Bootstrap: For responsive design and pre-built components.
features: User Authentication: Register and login using Firebase Authentication with email and password.
API Endpoints: Retrieve all products and get a specific product by ID.
Local Storage: Add products to the cart and retrieve them on the cart page.
Session Storage: Save the login status of the user.

projects.title: ThinkifyJS
projects.summary: ThinkifyJS is a collaborative open-source project designed for learners to enhance their development skills. My contributions include designing, coding, and maintaining the project while helping others learn and contribute step-by-step.
technologies: HTML: For structuring the web pages.
CSS: For styling and responsive design.
JavaScript: For application logic and interactivity.
Git & GitHub: For version control and collaboration.
features: Interactive Quiz: Users can answer questions and get immediate feedback.
Responsive Design: Works seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.
Session Storage: Save user progress during the session.
Open Source Collaboration: Designed for learners to contribute and grow together.

CSS: For styling and making the design visually appealing.
JavaScript: For adding interactive elements and enhancing functionality.

Interactive Navigation: Smooth scrolling and intuitive navigation for a better user experience.
Customizable: Easily extendable to add more projects or update content.
